channel.title: Comments on: A bug with Query of Query and * ?
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: dfguy
item.dc:creator: dfguy
item.description: rule of thumb. always list out the columns and avoid using "*". QoQ is a great feature, but it has a lot of little annoyances about it.
item.content:encoded: rule of thumb. always list out the columns and avoid using "*". QoQ is a great feature, but it has a lot of little annoyances about it.
